channel.title: Need help will rep++ anyone SINCE NO ONE ANSWERS!
channel.description: OK i have a compiler problem or what not could someon please take a look like teamview me or i can upload a few more pics... i wanted to add npc definitions but when i compile the server it doesnt make a difference...... i am using eclipse 639 to make my full rs remake also i have a question... also if i wanted to add pack yaks to eclipse 639 how would i do this and would anyone be willing to help me? for rep++ [IMG]http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff502/codyskate5021/isoneedhelp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff502/codyskate5021/compilehelp2.jpg[/img]

i think u can just change the code for NPCs *.java to XML i dont really know

item.title: Need help will rep++ anyone SINCE NO ONE ANSWERS!
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:2, topic:421836”]The compiler for java will only compile .java source files. you can’t compile a .xml. you can however make a .java file that loads the .xml.

don’t ask me how tho…[/quote]
ok how would i do that… or how would i make a repacker

Read full topic
item.source: Need help will rep++ anyone SINCE NO ONE ANSWERS!

item.title: Need help will rep++ anyone SINCE NO ONE ANSWERS!
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

The compiler for java will only compile .java source files. you can’t compile a .xml. you can however make a .java file that loads the .xml.

don’t ask me how tho…

Read full topic
